title: I would really like to swap summoner names with someone, but I don't know how to go about it
body:
A new season has come, and thus I am to move over to EU West. The only problem is, Bentley is already in use over there. What I need to know is:

* Am I allowed to set up negotiations with him so I can pay him to have him change his summoner name, or would that be taking profit from Riot?
* What is the best way to do this?
* Should there be a middleman when I pay and he changes?

Thanks.

replies.body:
You can pursue a Summoner name on another region if you'd like, but just as a heads up that Riot cannot be involved in any transactions outside of the game. I'd personally recommend being careful if you decide to try to set something up, as it's pretty easy to get burned in a situation like this.

Best of luck!
